text:
I downloaded the latest (bin) release of ant and wasn't able to get it started. Everytime when I executed ant.bat the only message i got was "Syntax error"

Curious about this i looked trough the ant.bat and recognized an error at line 83.

Original:
if _USE_CLASSPATH==no goto findAntHome

Change it to this and it works:
if %_USE_CLASSPATH%==no goto findAntHome

Please change this in the repository, Thanks
creator: mcstevo@hotmail.de
